docs.snippet: Trading in bonds yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange lapsed into the doldrums with the turnover is all issues dwindling to the smallest for a two-hour period since Oct. 31, 1936. Total transactions amounted to only $3,545,500, compared with...
docs.lead_paragraph: Trading in bonds yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange lapsed into the doldrums with the turnover is all issues dwindling to the smallest for a two-hour period since Oct. 31, 1936. Total transactions amounted to only $3,545,500, compared with $5,443,000 on Saturday...

headline.main: SLACKNESS RULES TRADING IN BONDS; General Undertone, However, Is Firm as Prices Dawdle in Narrow Range; TREASURYS CLOSE MIXED; New York Central's 6s Lose 2 Points--Symington-Gould 4s Off 18 --Trend Up on Curb

docs.snippet: A survey by American military authorities disclosed today that at least 55,000,000 trained men can "spring to arms overnight" in forty-eight nations.
docs.lead_paragraph: A survey by American military authorities disclosed today that at least 55,000,000 trained men can "spring to arms overnight" in forty-eight nations.
docs.abstract: 474,378 men including Natl Guard and Reserves

headline.main: WORLD'S SOLDIERS PUT AT 55,000,000; United States Is Nineteenth in List With 474,378 in Army, Guard and Reserve

docs.snippet: The list of the President Monroe of the Dollar Line, which arrives today from the regular 'round-theworld voyage via the West Coast, includes Mr. and Mrs. Robert J. Burns, Mr. and Mrs. Walter A. Findlay, Edward J. Gillroy, Mr. and Mrs. William C....
docs.lead_paragraph: The list of the President Monroe of the Dollar Line, which arrives today from the regular 'round-theworld voyage via the West Coast, includes Mr. and Mrs. Robert J. Burns, Mr. and Mrs. Walter A. Findlay, Edward J. Gillroy, Mr. and Mrs. William C. Owens, Miss Dorothy Pattison and Miss Belle Smith.

headline.main: SHIPPING AND MAILS; Ships Which Arrived Yesterday

docs.snippet: Dr. Cesar Charlone, Finance Minister of Uruguay, arrived yesterday on the Munson liner Southern Cross to start with officials of the State Department conversations that may lead to negotiation of a trade treaty with the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Cesar Charlone, Finance Minister of Uruguay, arrived yesterday on the Munson liner Southern Cross to start with officials of the State Department conversations that may lead to negotiation of a trade treaty with the United States.
docs.abstract: Dr C Charlone endorses monetary conf proposal

headline.main: URUGUAY OFFICIAL HERE TO AID TRADE; Reciprocal Treaty Is Aim of Dr. Charlone, Finance Chief, on Way to Capital
